content.html: Interesting notification from @ThePracticalDev. I took a look at the plagiarised post via the Wayback Machine - the dolt hadn't even changed my name in the example text! Anyway, you can read my original at shkspr.mobi/blog/2021/12/a…
content.value:
Interesting notification from @ThePracticalDev.
I took a look at the plagiarised post via the Wayback Machine - the dolt hadn't even changed my name in the example text!
Anyway, you can read my original at shkspr.mobi/blog/2021/12/a…

photo.alt:
Hey Terence,

We wanted to send you a message to let you know that we received reports that a DEV user had plagiarized elements of your article "An NFT without a Blockchain. No gas fees. No Eth. No gatekeepers"with a post on dev.to.

Community members flagged the post quite quickly, and we took action to un-publish the post, reprimand the author, and thank everyone who had made us aware of the issue. We take plagiarism reports very seriously and strive to act quickly whenever we identify an occurrence.

If you have any questions, please let us know!

DEV Team
